name: library-odin
description: - Ability to add books with values: Title, Author and isCompleted ✔️ - Ability to change isCompleted status of existing book ✔️ - Ability to delete book from collection ✔️ ## Extra ### Functionality - More types of works: movies, games, etc. ✔️ - Ability to edit any value of work (probably as popup window) ❌ - Rating with stars ❌ - Sorting collections ❌ ### Visuals - Adding new work as popup instead of aside bar ❌ - Collection looking like shelf with backs or (more mainstream) frontcovers ❌ - Work expanding when hovering over its back (merge of both ideas above) ❌
author: marcin_skic
